all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But, behold, faith cometh not by signs, but signs follow those that believe.
Doctrine and Covenants 63:9
Quote of the Day
"As we sustain our prophet, we testify he is called of our Savior."
Ronald A. Rasband | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
